content: सभाज् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (सभाजयति-ते) {@--1@} To salute, pay respects, greet, render homage to, congratulate; स्नेहात्सभाजयितुमेत्य <ls>U. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>Śi. 13. 14</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To honour, worship, respect. {@--3@} To please, gratify. {@--4@} To beautify, adorn, grace; <ls>U. 4. 19.</ls> {@--5@} To show.
